attributes.action: Make itv or bbc to make a live brexit debate  for the main government parties
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this we need a debate  and the public need o have there say and also have answers to the whole deal that but forward by may
attributes.background: We need this debate on this and corben and may would do but itv say no

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of the broadcasters and political parties and not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
